title: Login page not loading
description: Customer reports that the login page freezes after entering credentials.

title: Error 500 on dashboard
description: Dashboard throws an internal server error when accessed.

title: Password reset email not received
description: User did not get password reset email after multiple attempts.

title: Slow website performance
description: Pages take more than 10 seconds to load on mobile devices.

title: Incorrect billing amount
description: Customer charged twice for the same subscription.

title: Broken contact form
description: The contact form on the website does not submit successfully.

title: Missing profile picture upload option
description: Customer cannot find the option to upload a profile picture.

title: Notification settings not saving
description: Changes to notification preferences are not being saved.

title: App crashes on startup
description: Mobile app closes immediately after opening on Android 14.

title: Search function not returning results
description: Search bar shows no results even for valid queries.

title: Broken links in FAQ page
description: Several links on the FAQ page lead to 404 errors.

title: File upload limit exceeded
description: Customer unable to upload files larger than 5MB despite plan allowing 10MB.

title: Two-factor authentication failure
description: User receives invalid code error when entering OTP.

title: Language settings not applied
description: System always defaults back to English regardless of chosen language.

title: Subscription auto-renewal issue
description: Customer reports subscription did not auto-renew as expected.
